name: My Dear C
greetingText: 每次只要写下你名字的开头，我就会忍不住嘴角上翘（如果我有尾巴一定翘得很高
wishText: May the love、shine and happiness always be with you! :)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! With so much love and wishes
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text3: But I think it's far from enough.
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
